review: Fire stick would not recognize my network. I change to several locations even next to roster. Unfortunately I did my testing long after I could return the fire stick.
author: Donald Allen

review: After a week we got a blue screen with the text, HDCP unauthorized. Content disabled.  We noticed on line that it is a common problem. Through an series of unplug this and plug in that, we were able to get it to work again. It's very disappointed that we are having a well known reocurring issues with it after one week.
author: Debra

review: Absolutely love it.  Easy to navigate.  Love love love.
author: elizabeth ferrell

review: The fire stick was exactly as described. I have thoroughly enjoyed having it for convenience. Before having the fire stick I used hdmiCable to plug into the tablet. Having the fire stick makes things much less complicated.
author: Tommie

review: It is simply outstanding.  All you need is a HDMI port.  Do not need a SMartv, it just works!  I love it
author: Amazon Customer "Deacon Tom"

review: Bought this as a gift. They could not use. I had received Smart Tv for X-mas. Found it very slow to respond. Was going to return Fire TV stick, but tried on my new smart TV. What a difference the Fire stick has made. Everything works much faster and easier now. So glad I tried it before returning.
author: BA "BA"
